content: this snake is a simple and easy project it will just take a year to make him - if you use him for following your temperatures each day you can always just make a fun long colorful snake anytime of the year if using suggested hook and yarn your snake will be approximately 8 1/2 feet long you can make him 1 of 2 ways ---- stuff him/her and have a long slithery snake or just stuff the head only and leave the rest unstuffed and use as a super duper long snakey scarf hang your snake above the windows in your childs rooms hang in a tree coil up and put in your rear window on your car so many places you can put them you can even stuff with those weighted pellets and use for a draft stopper at the bottom of your door have fun and if you make one please share on ig tagging me so i can see your creation you can also follow #temperaturesnake2022 on ig and see all the snakes coming to life for the year of 2022
